meta.description: Should you or your kids be vaccinated or get the annual flu shot? In this video from 2009, Andreas Moritz offers some advice on whether or not vaccines are effective against disease and illness. Are there other concerns with vaccines? Andreas covers this as well and many other things you need to know before making a decision. http://www.ihealthtube.com

title: This Will Make You Think Twice About Getting That Vaccine!
cleaned_text:
Should you or your kids be vaccinated or get the annual flu shot? In this video from 2009, Andreas Moritz offers some advice on whether or not vaccines are effective against disease and illness. Are there other concerns with vaccines? Andreas covers this as well and many other things you need to know before making a decision.

 http://www.ihealthtube.com
